title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, I am unable to select any item on the first attempt. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

Observed Behavior: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in outline view.

Expected Behavior: When I click on an item in the library outline view, it should be selected at the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item and observe that the focus jumps to the library file node.
3. Select the same item again and observe that it can be selected this time.
